column4: when I install drivers for my card I lose Xserver video output
and I wish I knew why but I can't seem to find anyone that knows anything about it
was it working before you installed glx?
does lsmod show the nvidia module loaded?
if not, then do modprobe nvidia
I don't know what is wrong
you have an nvidia card installed right?
I thought you were using gdm
if you reboot the machine what do you see when the machine is done booting?
you are using a stock kernel right?
if you are using nvidia, you do not want dri
